1.5.0.name: wordpress/contact-export
1.5.0.description:
This is a export plugin for the metainformation of every single post. You can select a category or search in the front panel and than you can download your choosen posts.

For this Plugin is Flutter or Pods(perhaps in the future ;) ) very usefull. You can build a bridge between a wordpress CRM and Outlook, Thunderbird or other mail clients. But word for massmails are useful too.

I'll try a Apache Camel integration as autmatic bridge between the systems next time.
